definitions.title: conj.
definitions.body: for the sake of on account of, in order that (perh. orig. for the produce or gain of), sf. [[בַּעֲבוּרִי]] 1Sa 23:10, etc.;—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: Ge 3:17 [[ארורה האדמה בעבורך]] for thy sake, Ge 8:21 [[בעבור האדם]] for man's sake, Ge 12:13 [[לְמַעַן יִיטַב־לִי בַּעֲבוּרֵח]], v:Ge 12:16, Ge 18:26, Ge 18:29, Ge 26:24, Ex 9:16 [[זאׁת]] ´[[ב]] Ex 13:8 [[זה]] ´[[ב]] 1Sa 12:22, 2Sa 5:12, 2Sa 6:12, 2Sa 7:21, 2Sa 9:1, 2Sa 9:7, Am 2:6, Am 8:6 [[נַעֲלָָיִם]] ´[[ואביון ב]], Mic 2:10 [[טָמְאָה]] ´[[ב]] on account of uncleanness, Ps 106:32, Ps 132:10, etc.; 2Sa 12:21 [[הַיֶּלֶד חַי]] ´[[ב]] because of the child, (being) alive (= while he was alive), Je 14:4 [[הָאֲדָמָה]] ´[[ב]] [[חַ֫תָּה]] on account of the ground, (which) is dismayed, Job 20:2 [[וּבַעֲבוּר חוּשִׁי בִּי]] rd. [[זאׁת]] ´[[וב]], or [[וּבַעֲבוּרָהּ]]. †
